name: Not a lonely travel
description:
Space travel is not always as quiet as it could seem, face wild asteroids and evil UFO's in need of destruction.

This game is about a space ship in need of protection. You've been prepared for this, so let's get right into it!

  • Follow and Protect the space ship.
  • Shoot torpedes to break asteroids and UFOs.
  • Avoid crashing into objects.
  • Try to reach as far as you can! Feel free to leave your highscore in the comments.

CONTROLS

  • Player Ship
    • ( Space ) to accelerate
    • ( A & S ) to turn
    • ( Left Mouse Click ) to shoot torpede
  • Torpede
    • ( Mouse ) for direction
    • ( Left Mouse Click ) to accelerate
